## Shape.Font property

表示形状的字体。

```csharp
public Font Font { get; set; }
```

### 例子

```csharp

[C#]
Aspose.Cells.Font font = shape.Font;
font.Name = "Arial";
font.Size = 12;
font.Color = Color.Red;
```
